title: Yummy chocolate muffins
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '110 to 170g white sugar or light brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 egg', '260ml milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '90ml vegetable oil', 'chocolate chips for topping']
